title: Thousands attend Amsterdam tattoo festival
text:
Advertisement

Skin artists from across the globe have arrived in Amsterdam for the city's 15th International Tattoo Convention.

Experts from across the globe have arrived in the Dutch city while fans have the opportunity to book sessions and get inked in some outrageous designs.

As well as tattooists, body piercing experts have been invited to showcase their work.

This model attending the International Tattoo Convention might be cheating as her body modifications may be less than permanent

However, many of those attending the convention took the opportunity to get some new skin art from the assembled artists

Thousands of tattoo fans are expected to attend the popular annual event which is being held in Amsterdam

Matt Gone (right) and Zombiepunk (centre) are two of the more popular visitors to the Tattoo convention

Mat Gone, pictured, has his entire body covered in tattoos and has coloured his eyes and even his tongue

Many of the exhibitors use the convention as an opportunity to show off their skills and advertise for new clients looking to cover the remaining sections of skin

Many of those attending the event take off many of their clothes so they can show off the artwork on their bodies

This young lady has an elaborate peacock design on her back as well as a flower garden. He has taken the opportunity

Zombiepunk, pictured, has studs sticking out of his nose and cheeks and has had his tongue 'forked' like a serpent

This gentleman appears to be a fan of horror movies and has had a number of characters tattooed onto this chest

This tattoo artist is working on his client's throat during the annual convention which is also a massive competition

This gentleman, left, has a giant gorilla tattooed onto his back while another visitor has work done on his back

This lady sits silently leaning forward while her tattoo artist works patiently on her back during the major convention
description: Thousands of visitors are attending this weekend's International Tattoo Convention in Amsterdam where 350 of the best artists in the world are showcasing their work.
